Great to meet with you and I'm proud to to sponsor the bill.  Now is the time to establish a #latinomuseum and ensure that our history is fully represented! #LatinoHistoryisAmericanHistory https://twitter.com/latinomuseum/status/1154117009484984321 …
As the longest serving member of Congress of Puerto Rican descent, I will continue to fight on behalf of and stand up for the people of Puerto Rico- as I have done throughout my career.
Recent events will only make things harder at the Federal level going forward, but I am confident that together, the island can find ways to overcome these challenges.
Now #PuertoRico must come together and chart a path forward as the island continues recovering from the ongoing economic crisis and the effects of hurricane Maria.
Puerto Ricans have spoken and demanded accountability and respect from their leaders.  They have spoken out against mismanagement and corruption, issues that have no party lines on the island.

AG Barr’s decision to not file civil rights charges against NYPD officer Daniel Pantaleo for the death of Eric Garner is an injustice to his family & our city. The lack of police accountability, in this case, makes evident once again how far we still have to go.

In the case of @AOC/@RepAOC, if he was referring to her being of Puerto Rican descent, it seems like he once again forgot that #PuertoRico is part of the U.S.  We are part of the American family & the President needs to realize that we aren't going anywhere.

Over the weekend President Trump decided to attack four of my colleagues & suggest that they go back to where they came from. This is racism in its purest form, a distortion of facts, and a disgrace to the office he holds.
